example.text: There are times when values must trump short-term profit maximization like opposing the oppression of the Uyghurs. Watch [[user]] —who was apparently unaware of their oppression—reject this view and worship at the altar of profits above all other American values. [[url]]

Defaulting on our debt would be catastrophic. Let’s pay our bills & then talk about how to reduce the deficit. One potentially bipartisan way is to audit multimillion-dollar firms that gamed the system with COVID relief loan fraud & return the money to the taxpayers. [[url]]
Medical debt should not exist in America. I’m working on a bill to cancel it and clear it from credit reports.

There are times when values must trump short-term profit maximization like opposing the oppression of the Uyghurs. Watch [[user]] —who was apparently unaware of their oppression—reject this view and worship at the altar of profits above all other American values. [[url]]
It’s time to get money out of politics by passing my No PAC Act. [[url]]

At the same time, however, there were important victories in the bill that advance our national security interests. I'm proud that several of my amendments to reduce civilian harm were adopted in the final FY23 conference report, which will strengthen the United States' moral and strategic imperative to protect civilians from harm in US military operations.
It’s time to get money out of politics by passing my No PAC Act. [[url]]
